title: How do churches stay in business? - Quora

response.answer_text: They have outreach programs to keep and maintain market share (such as door to door visits) They advertise through bulletins and on the web to build membership further. They have regular bleeding sessions known as “the collection” They have various “doner” programs where you give a monthly regular amount for preferential perks, such as a pew at the front. They don’t pay taxes. They amass property, assets, and make investments with their investment agent. They have various “fund-raising” events for “charitable works”
It is a struggle for most. Most churches are small. Many get quite a bit of revenue from day care during the day. Many have to close their doors and/or merge with other churches.
